Articles.Content:
Hydrochloric acid on your table?

 

Easy fix! Just let your hand dry the hydrochloric acid.

 

Edit: 

Spoiler

NEVER EVER DO THIS!

Your rocket ascends too slowly because of it's weight? Mash spacebar for getting rid all of it!

Edited June 2, 2017 by ARS
Aperture Science will give you 60 dollars if you let them disassemble you!

Tired of being poor? 

Get a dollar, and share it with your friends. Because you have no friends, 1 divided by 0 is infinity,

you now have infinite money!!

2 hours ago, ModerndayLink64 said:

Tired of being poor? 

Get a dollar, and share it with your friends. Because you have no friends, 1 divided by 0 is infinity,

you now have infinite money!!

*Cue cool lecture about small infinities vs. large infinities

9 hours ago, ModerndayLink64 said:

Tired of being poor? 

Get a dollar, and share it with your friends. Because you have no friends, 1 divided by 0 is infinity,

you now have infinite money!!

Tip of the day  you can get infinity even dividng 0 by 0. You don't need a dollar.
You can use debt also! Negitive numbers work too.

the word: "ninguem" annoy me .... but it's a lot of years old ... and most don't remind me "partially" included

Edited July 13, 2017 by WinkAllKerb''

ran out of grenades in a zombie apocalypse? just go to the nearest Samsung store

Edited July 14, 2017 by LJITimate
Can't think of a good idea for where to go on a date? Go to the baby factory, and see how babies are made.

On Monday, July 10, 2017 at 1:30 AM, kerbiloid said:

Tip of the day  you can get infinity even dividng 0 by 0. You don't need a dollar.

Have to be careful with that, though. Sometimes, it's not actually 0 over 0.

x^2-4/x-2 when x=2.
You can. Though, not necessary will..
Lifehacks: You don't have to buy your air- just step out the door!

4 hours ago, Confused Scientist said:

Lifehacks: You don't have to buy your air- just step out the door!

Ooh, looks like O'hare is going out of business..

Want Apple (tm)? Ask Amazon (tm)!

Are you out of storage space?
Does your boss annoy you?
Does the neighbor's dog keep you awake at night?
Want to loose a few kilograms quickly and easily?

We here at FOOF industries™ are proud to present dioxygen difluoride as an easy solution to most of life's problems, but don't take our word for it, here are some testimonials from valued customers;

John
"Our heater broke down last winter but thanks to dioxygen difluoride my family stayed toasty warm".

Renae
"My car wouldn't start and I was late for an appointment, luckily I had some dioxygen difluoride so my worries were over".

Micheal
"All my life I've had sensitive teeth but after a few drops of dioxygen difluoride, cold water was no longer an issue for me.  Thank you FOOF".

7 hours ago, James Kerman said:

Are you out of storage space?
Does your boss annoy you?
Does the neighbor's dog keep you awake at night?

"... You are just a loser! Just face this!"
If your potatoes are too hard, try cooking them before you eat - you'll be amazed at the difference it makes.
If not sure if you're happy, try clapping your hands. If you're happy, you'll know it, if not, you'll look like an idiot!
Need to communicate with someone halfway across the country? Use Morse code bouncing a powerful laser off the International Space Station.
Can't seem to stop using oil and start using green energy? Simple! Just dump all the oil in the ocean!

Cold legs? Just buy a crappy laptop and build 5000 part ships in KSP! Instant heater(and slideshow)!!

Edited April 8, 2018 by RealKerbal3x
Cat won't stop meowing? Stop feeding it "Meow Mix"
If you drown, just drink all the water.
